EmailTemplate.name: OSS_Webinar_7AM Spring Boot and Ratpack Web Framework.Confirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: Webinar Confirmation: Spring Boot and Ratpack Web Framework
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=There}}, Thank you for registering for our upcoming webinar Spring Boot and Ratpack Web Frameworks on Thursday, March 31, 2016.
Please see event details below:
Date: Thursday, March 31, 2016 Time: 3:00PM (London, BST)
Join the Session <[[http://event.on24.com/wcc/r/1153850/043C4F1CF3A8DD7A9F15F8FC987E7707]]> Audio Information: This webinar will be streaming live via your computer speakers. {{my.My Token:default=Save the Date}}
We look forward to you joining us!
